backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing appointment requests and user profiles with access control for viewing profiles and listing appointments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping logo and theme updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and key behavior of major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup defining layout and routes for landing, booking, confirmation, and staff pages.
frontend/src/components/ClinicDetailsSec: Component showing services, additional care, contact info, and clinic details using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated staff to save their name if no profile exists, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the clinic footer with contact info, services, and a dynamic year plus a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive site header with logo, navigation buttons, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating appointments, listing appointments, and managing the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode themes, and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BookAppointmentPage.t: Displays a form for booking appointments, validates inputs, submits to backend, and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Displays a confirmation message after an appointment request is submitted and provides phone info plus navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the clinic landing page with hero branding, feature highlights, and buttons to book appointments or access the staff portal.
frontend/src/pages/StaffAppointmentsPage: Shows staff-only appointment listings with authentication, loading/error states, and formatted appointment details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and extended utilities for the project.
project_state.json: Project state describing current features, requirements, theme notes, and image usage rules for the clinic website.
